title: GeneLab Proteomics Runsheet Schema
description: Schema for validating proteomics runsheet CSV files

Sample Name.description: Unique identifier for the sample, added as a prefix to sample-specific processed data output files. Should not include spaces or weird characters.

data_file.description: URL or path to the mass spectrometry data file in mzML format

organism.description: Species name used to map to the appropriate UniProt proteome ID if a reference proteome or UniProt ID are not provided as a Nextflow parameter. Also used to extend output tables with annotations corresponding to the species.

Source Name.description: Biological replicate identifier. Multiple fractions from the same biological sample should share the same Source Name.

^Factor Value\\[.*\\]$.description: Experimental group the sample belongs to. Used to create the Experiment field in the FragPipe manifest.
